title: Why Relate to a Personal God critiqued by John Vervaeke
description:
The rise of secularity and the penetration of the meaning crisis have been directly related to the recession of a personal God. John Vervaeke has been working on the meaning crisis in his series "Awakening from the Meaning Crisis" and he has been a willing collaborator in engaging these questions. 

Over my last 2 years of pondering the work of Jordan Peterson I've been working through many issues in psychology and the Biblical Story. I've learned from Pascal, CS Lewis and Jonathan Pageau as well. What has developed is a "little corner of the Internet" where a few of us are having meaning conversations about God, meaning, existence and community. 

PDF of Powerpoint I use for this argument http://bit.ly/2Z5z1KN
Awakening from the Meaning Crisis https://youtu.be/54l8_ewcOlY
Think Big Animations (mentioned here) https://www.youtube.com/user/zekedeg

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
